page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
Here are some favourite skipping rope rhymes from our school. { { THE ALLIGATOR PURSE}(3 people) In goes the doctor, In goes the nurse, In goes the lady with the alligator purse. Out goes the doctor, Out goes the nurse, Out goes the lady with the alligator purse.
{OLIVER TWIST }(action and skipping) Oliver Twist, you can't do this, So what's the use of trying ? No. 1 Touch your tongue. No. 2 Touch your shoe. No. 3 Touch your knee. No. 4 Touch the floor. No. 5 Take a dive. No. 6 Do the splits.
